A

ActionCard - Class in <Unnamed>
this class is another subclass of Card super class, but unlike NormalCard subclass, this class(mainly its subclasses) has some important effects on the game
ActionCard(int, String, String) - Constructor for class ActionCard
it just initializes Card super class fields
addAmountToWholeScore(int) - Method in class Player
adds a new amount to Player.wholeScore or subtract a amount from it
addCard(Card) - Method in class GameLaunch
adds a card to GameLaunch.cardsDeck
addNewCard(Card) - Method in class Player
adds a new card to player cards
addPlayer() - Method in class GameLaunch
adds how many players that was added to GameLaunch.gameMode
addRandomCardToPlayer() - Method in class GameLaunch
adds a random card to player from GameLaunch.cardsDeck
